Self-Support in Foreign Fields. 

     THE MADISON SCHOOL HAS BEEN INSTRUCTED TO TRAIN SELF-SUPPORTING MISSIONARIES FOR FOREIGN FIELDS. IT IS REMARKABLE HOW RAPIDLY THE MISSIONARIES IN FOREIGN FIELDS ARE COMING TO SEE THE NEED OF SELF-SUPPORT IN THOSE FIELDS. FROM INDIA, CHINA, KOREA, JAPAN, SOUTH AMERICA, AND AFRICA COMES THE TESTIMONY THAT THE FUTURE SUCCESSFUL MISSIONARY MUST HIMSELF BE SELF-SUPPORTING AND MUST TEACH HIS CONVERTS TO EARN THEIR LIVING.
